Comment: Cell body location determined by enhancer trap expression (Kamikouchi et al.
Zone E Johnston organ neuron.Has_presynaptic_layer_in: antennal mechanosensory and motor center zone E
Zone E Johnston organ neuron.Definition: Johnston's organ neuron that innervates zone E of the antennal mechanosensory and motor center (AMMC). The cell bodies of these neurons are co-mingled with those of zone C Johnston organ neurons, forming a broad ring mainly in the medial and outer layers of the Johnston's organ.
